entry.title: FOG ADVISORY, Kugluktuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:33 p.m. MDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:32 PM MDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning near noon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:32 PM MDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the evening and overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:32 PM MDT Monday 8 May 2023
